      • assembleEntryEntities

        protected java.util.List<BaseEntry> assembleEntryEntities(Context respCtx,
                                              BaseTicket clientTicket)
                                                   throws ApplicationException
        Assemble multiple-betting entries. Now player can specify the betting amount of a entry, and TE may need to split a entry whose entry amount is multiple times of base amount into multiple entries.

        Lets suppose that a LOTTO game 5/16, and base amount is $0.25. Player buys a ticket as below, 

         <Ticket multipleDraws="1" totalAmount="4.0" PIN="!!!!!!">
     <GameDraw number="20090301" gameId="79d78c12392b23a5238" />
     <Entry selectedNumber="2,3,7,8,15" betOption="1" inputChannel="1">
     <Entry selectedNumber="1,3,5,8,12" betOption="1" inputChannel="1" entryAmount="0.75"/>
     <Entry selectedNumber="1,2,6,10,14,15" betOption="2" inputChannel="0" entryAmount="3.0"/>
 </Ticket>
        TE will generate below ticket entries(table 'TE_LOTTO_ENTRY'),
        Entry Entry ID Selected Number Bet Option Entry No. Total Bets Entry Amount Multiple Count
        2,3,7,8,15 1 2,3,7,8,15 1 1 1 0.25 1
        1,3,5,8,12 2 1,3,5,8,12 1 2 1 0.25 3
        3 1,3,5,8,12 1 2 1 0.25 0
        4 1,3,5,8,12 1 2 1 0.25 0
        1,2,6,10,14,15 5 1,2,6,10,14,15 2 3 6 1.5 2
        6 1,2,6,10,14,15 2 3 6 1.5 0
        覆盖:
        assembleEntryEntities 在类中 AbstractTicketService
        抛出:
        ApplicationException
